shtag_2433983.value: The Centre, Tigne' Point, Sliema, Malta, TPO 0001

shtag_2433980.value: Since the last publication, there were no changes to the name of the reporting entity.

shtag_2433978.value: principal customer-related activities of MeDirect Malta and MeDirect Belgium include an easy-to-use wealth platform with access to fund houses and mutual funds, a suite of wealth products available digitally through digital channels, attractive and innovative savings products in Malta and Belgium and senior secured loans and revolving credit facilities to finance the business of European corporates

shtag_2433985.value:
Commitments to lend

Commitments to lend represent undrawn formal standby facilities, credit facilities and other similar commitments to lend. As at 31 December 2021, the Group and Bank had undrawn commitments of €208.4 million (2020: €341.4 million) and €188.4 million (2020: €327.9 million) respectively under revolving credit facilities. In addition, lending commitments in relation to the Group’s Dutch Mortgage portfolio amounted to €72.1 million (2020: €335.7 million) and Maltese Mortgage portfolio amounted to €37.5 million (2020: nil). As at 31 December 2021, undrawn facilities on corporate term loans of the Group and Bank amounted to €58.3 million (2020: €58.9 million).

shtag_2433984.value:
Commitments to purchase

As at 31 December 2021, the Group and Bank also had commitments to purchase facilities on term loans amounting to €11.0 million (2020: €22.0 million) and €1.0 million (2020: €22.0 million) respectively. The commitments as at 31 December 2020 were subject to back-to-back sale agreements with Grand Harbour CLO 2019-1, that was previously managed by MeDirect Malta.
